notesStmt.note: "In the supplemental part [p. 645-704 (i.e. 694)] I have given you the substance of Taliacautius, concerning the supplying of a nose, lip, or ear artificially". Cf. prelim. p. [8].
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
